description:
## üéôÔ∏è Voice Note to Tweet: Turn Audio Ideas into X Posts with n8n

A **lean, 3-node automation** that turns voice memos into tweets ‚Äî so creators can capture ideas on the go and publish fast, without typing.


Capture inspiration the moment it strikes ‚Äî even when you‚Äôre not at your desk. This 3-node workflow lets **content creators, coaches, and solopreneurs** turn voice memos into **X (Twitter) posts** automatically.

Just record a voice note, upload it to a Google Drive folder, and n8n will:

## üõ†Ô∏è Step-by-Step Setup Instructions

### 1. **Prepare Google Drive Folder**
- Create a folder: `Voice Notes to Tweet`
- Enable **Google Drive API** in your n8n credentials
- Share the folder with your automation account (if needed)

### 2. **Set Up AssemblyAI (or Whisper)**
- Sign up at [assemblyai.com](https://www.assemblyai.com/)
- Get your API key
- In n8n, add a credential for **HTTP Request** or use a dedicated node

> üîÅ Alternative: Use OpenAI‚Äôs Whisper API if preferred

### 3. **Connect X (Twitter) Account**
- Use n8n‚Äôs **X (Twitter) node**
- Authenticate with your app key, secret, access token
- Ensure **write permissions**

### 4. **Deploy the Workflow**
- Import the JSON below
- Replace placeholder credentials:
  - `{{GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID}}`
  - `{{ASSEMBLYAI_API_KEY}}`
  - `{{TWITTER_CREDENTIAL}}`
- Activate the workflow

Now, every time you upload a `.m4a`, `.mp3`, or `.wav` file to your folder ‚Äî it becomes a tweet.

---

## üîÑ Workflow Explanation

1. **Watch Google Drive** ‚Üí Triggers when a new voice note is added  
2. **Transcribe Audio** ‚Üí Sends file to AssemblyAI for speech-to-text  
3. **Post to X (Twitter)** ‚Üí Publishes the transcript as a tweet  

Optional: Add a **Slack approval step** if you don‚Äôt want auto-posting.

---

## üì¶ Pre-Conditions

- ‚úÖ **n8n account** with access to HTTP and X nodes
- ‚úÖ **Google Drive API enabled**
- ‚úÖ **AssemblyAI or Whisper API key**
- ‚úÖ **X (Twitter) Developer Account** with app credentials
- ‚úÖ Internet-accessible audio files (hosted in Drive)

> ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: X API v2 requires OAuth 2.0 and app approval.

---

## üé® Customization Guidance

| Enhancement | How |
|-----------|-----|
| **Add Approval Step** | Insert Slack/Telegram node to approve before posting |
| **Trim Long Transcripts** | Use Function node to limit to 280 chars |
| **Add Hashtags** | Append `#VoiceToTweet #ContentCreatorTips` |
| **Save to Archive** | After posting, move file to ‚ÄúProcessed‚Äù folder |
| **Support iOS Voice Memos** | Auto-convert `.m4a` ‚Üí compatible format |

---

## üåê Who It‚Äôs For

- **Coaches** who record insights on walks
- **Solopreneurs** building personal brands
- **Content creators** who hate writing from scratch
- **Thought leaders** capturing ideas in motion



### ‚úÖ Final Notes for Submission

- All nodes have **sticky notes** explaining purpose
- Uses **standard APIs** with documented credentials
- Solves a **real creator pain point**
- No fluff, no ‚Äúmagic‚Äù ‚Äî just **practical automation**
